snippet.title: Galactic Glitch - An action-packed Space-Roguelike - Play the Demo NOW!
snippet.description:
Play the Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/640160/Galactic_Glitch/

Inspired by Dead Cells, Galactic Glitch is an Action Space-Roguelike with fast and physical combat. You fight in bubbles of glitched Spacetime, hurling rocks, bouncing foes off walls and destroying your multi-part enemies piece-by-piece in tough-but-fair, Souls-inspired combat. Explore, destroy, die, repeat.

Signup for Beta: https://www.galacticglitch.space/
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/640160/Galactic_Glitch/
Get Updates on Discord: https://discord.gg/6jPYbpZa2g
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrunchyLeafGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CrunchyLeafGames
